title: Arabic 39
text: Neglect not My commandments if thou lovest My beauty, and forget not My counsels if thou wouldst attain My good pleasure.

prev.title: Arabic 38
prev.text: Walk in My statutes for love of Me and deny thyself that which thou desirest if thou seekest My pleasure.

next.title: Arabic 40
next.text: Wert thou to speed through the immensity of space and traverse the expanse of heaven, yet thou wouldst find no rest save in submission to Our command and humbleness before Our Face.
